QuestData.Title: Shadowmoonwell
QuestData.Description: The archmage has asked me to prepare this moonwell. Once it is completed, I'll be able to sanctify its water for use against the demon.$B$BOnly one thing remains.$B$BA piece of one of Draenor's moons has fallen into a nearby pool on the far side of the woods. Such a thing is perfect for use in the dedication of the moonwell to Elune.$B$BWill you bring it back for me, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Chunk of Lunar Rock.
QuestData.CompletionText: With that chunk of fallen rock, I'll be able to complete the dedication of the moonwell.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. The White Lady will be pleased.$B$BNow, I shall go about the business of preparing the moonwell water for use in the archmage's plan.$B$BBut first, I wonder if you'd be willing to help me again. The warden brought back very disturbing stories about the creatures in the woods.
